name: Vektor
description:
Theme: Bullet Hell

Find the Exit to progress to the next level. Beat 4 levels to square off against a boss. Use bombs to blow up Walls or Enemies.

Sound effects created with http://drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

Controls:

move: WASD    Shoot: Left Mouse Button    Fire Bombs: right mouse button

Dash: Space Bar   Fullscreen: F9    Restart: F11   Quit: Escape
